messages.title: The Past/The Future
messages.content: 'Both Tories and Labour have failed the country' - The Guardian, May 2019. 'British politics is falling apart - the Tories are to blame, but Labour is also a shambles' - The Irish Times, January 2019.

mentions.candidate: Jo Swinson is the Prime Minister we deserve

quotes.text: 'Both Tories and Labour have failed the country'
'British politics is falling apart - the Tories are to blame, but Labour is also a shambles'

images.caption: Jo Swinson is the Prime Minister we deserve
